entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Quesnel
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:21 AM PST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, 0.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Quesnel Airport 09:58 AM PST Thursday 26 January 2023

Temperature: 0.7°C

Visibility: 2.8 km
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 0.7°C

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Temperature steady near zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers this morning. Snow mixed with rain beginning near noon. Fog dissipating near noon. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow mixed with rain. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with rain ending this evening then cloudy. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 4.
